item.title: What Sam Altman's Firing Means for the Future of OpenAI
item.description: Sam Altman made OpenAI into a powerhouse by adding a profit-seeking arm to its utopian mission. After the board rejected his vision, the company’s remaining leaders must figure out a new path forward.

item.dc:creator: Steven Levy

item.title: Sam Altman’s Sudden Exit Sends Shockwaves Through OpenAI and Beyond
item.description: Microsoft’s Satya Nadella is reportedly “furious” following Altman's dramatic departure from OpenAI Friday. Meanwhile, OpenAI’s president and three senior researchers have resigned.
item.media:keywords: OpenAI, Startups, artificial intelligence

item.dc:subject: Ctrl-Altman-Delete
